title: Curriculum Vitae
subtitle: Senior Android Developer & Sub-Leader, Mobile Department
summary: Senior Android Developer with 5+ years of experience building secure, scalable, and high-performance mobile applications using Kotlin and modern Android architecture. Proven track record in fintech-related systems, cross-team collaboration, and international project delivery. Passionate about clean code, security best practices, and delivering reliable financial products with real-world impact.

experiences.title: Senior Android Developer & Sub-Leader, Mobile Department
achievements: Led development of enterprise-level Android applications using Kotlin and modern architecture, ensuring scalability, security, and long-term maintainability.
Served as Sub-Leader of the Mobile Department, coordinating task allocation and technical direction.
Mentored junior developers and enforced clean architecture and coding standards.
Introduced Jetpack Compose into production projects to modernize UI development.
Collaborated with backend, QA, and product teams to deliver stable, scalable releases.

experiences.title: International Assignment – Business Trip
achievements: Selected for a one-year assignment working with Korean fintech teams.
Translated technical requirements into actionable tasks for the Cambodian mobile team.
Ensured feature consistency across web and mobile platforms.
Acted as the main liaison between Cambodian and Korean developers, QA, and managers.
Supported feature planning, QA cycles, and production deployments.

experiences.title: Web Developer
achievements: Developed responsive web applications using custom CSS.
Built backend features using PHP and SQL.

Mobile Development: Jetpack (ViewModel, LiveData, StateFlow, Room, Navigation, DataStore)

education.details: Specialized in full-stack development with a focus on mobile application research and practical implementation.
App Development with JAVA (2018-2019), Web Application Development (2018)
